title: Which will be the best paid profession after 10 years? - Quora
tags: Salaries for Specific Jobs and Careers

response.answer_text: Any job which is tough to get into will be a high paying job. Half the battle is already won if you do something different than what the entire world is doing. It is likely that many wont even attempt to do something non-traditional just cause it is tough.Everyone doesn't become a rocket scientist even though it pays you a bomb! And why is that so - Cause it is Rocket Science!!It is very hard to predict what job will be at its peak after 10 years considering the world technology is changing so fast. But do something which not many people would attempt to do it and people will surely try to value your talent and pay you your amount just cause there is scarcity of that talent.

People who are amazing in their fields, who have worked hard and achieved great success will be highly paid. Sports, Engineering, Medical etc all the fields provide huge returns to people who are great in them. Instead on focussing on which jobs or fields will give higher returns, focus on the thing that interests you and start working on it.
